attributes.action: stop the addition of beef/pork gelatine to non-meat products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to all the vegetarians that are sick of having to check packaging of food for the big V logo or for "Suitable for Vegetarians" because food manufacturers insist on putting animal products (usually gelatine) into non-meat products. There are alternatives such as pectin for sweets etc so why can't they use the alternatives?
